Read more about the life in PayU here Job description - ESG ManagerRoles and Responsibilities:To drive implementation of the ESG framework and methodology / BRSR preparedness across the PayU India Group that is commensurate with the nature of our business
Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) across ESG / BRSR dimensions and embed into the ESG data tool for consistent and comprehensive reporting
Lead ESG / BRSR KPIs gathering and reconciliation and assurance process
Support in ESG data collation from functions and businesses and transferring data into specific templates for aggregation into companywide reporting
Further develop carbon accounting practices covering scope 1, 2 and 3 emissions and manage the related assurance processes. Work towards readiness to set science-based targets under the SBTi
Support annual Integrated reporting process with content and data across companywide sustainability KPI’s
Ongoing mapping of environment and social activities across the group and analysis for report outs against the defined strategic directions and targets
Support in presentation materials for both internal and external audiences
Research into local and global ESG developments, including benchmarking
Facilitate internal trainings on ESR, external and internal stakeholder engagement
Key liaison with Corporate Secretariat, Environment Management, finance and communications team on ESG / BRSR preparationSkills and experience:Minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience in providing advisory services and implementation expertise in ESG / Sustainability related topics
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Environmental Science, Sustainable Development, or a related technical subject area would be desirable
Has an in-depth understanding of material ESG topics with very strong expertise in carbon accounting, related target setting and benchmarking
Familiarity with various reporting frameworks, concepts and internationally prevalent ESG trends
Flexibility to multitask and meet project timelines and deliverables
Manage stakeholder relationships
Enjoys challenges and is a team player
Should have very good communication skills Job Details
